column3: You are a very warm and cuddly person. You are always there for people who need you. You are a little lazy but you have lots of moral support to offer.
You are very smart and you like to work alone. You have beautiful orange fur and a sense of craftiness.
You LOVE your family and you are very smart. You can defend yourself if you feel threatened but you have a very cuddly nature.
You will do anything to protect your family and loved ones. You are kind but you also have a fierce side.
You are as powerful as you think you are. You can be deadly but you send out warnings before.
You are a quiet person. You are usually alone and you have a mysterious side. You are powerful but not showy about it.
You are misunderstood about how adorable you are! You are unnecessarily feared by people who don't know your strengths.
You are very fast and sporty. You are not the biggest and strongest but you are great at what you do.
You have all the great qualities: You are fast, big, strong and admired by other people.
